description: I installed it, it wouldnt open. I then tried to uninstall it via the store, didnt work. I had to purge everything via the command line. Sus product, would advise researching it carefully before installing. I might have screwed up my system.

When you click on it, you can see it in the task manager for about 1 to 2 seconds, and then, like a wet firework, best you can hope for is a tiny little pfft sound. Okay, actually it does not even do that. I ran top in Konsole terminal and I watched for a good minute and found nothing that hinted at this, nor any of its dependencies, which I did fulfill, btw, and still nothing. It is a real let-down, because it is not the easiest thing in the world trying to satisfy all the dependencies/ suggestions. Try again, maybe in a few months. I mean, at this point, since I was the first one to leave a review and this not being all that new to Discover, why bother with a Bug Report?  MC
summary: Tries to load, then fizzles out
